amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds in the bill for the Jamaica Chamber of Commerce, Jamaica, NY, for the Jamaica Export Center.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 104 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill for the Jamaica Chamber of Commerce, Jamaica, NY, for the Jamaica Export Center.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 295 (Roll no. 376).
